word: At this very time Nathanael was praying to know whether this was indeed the Christ of whom Moses and the prophets had spoken. While he continued to pray, one of those who had been brought to Christ, Philip by name, called to him and said, \93We have found him of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.\94 Notice how quickly  prejudice arises. Nathanael says, \93Can there any good thing come out of  Nazareth?\94 Philip knew the strong prejudice that existed in the minds of many  against Nazareth, and he did not try to argue with him, for fear of raising  his combativeness, but simply said, \93Come and see.\94
